text: Golescu may be any of several members of a family from what is now Romania: *Dinicu Golescu (1777–1830), writer *Zoe Golescu (1792–1879), revolutionary *Ștefan Golescu (1809–1874), politician *Nicolae Golescu (1810–1877), politician *Alexandru G. Golescu (1819–1881), politician ==See also== *Golescu Bridge, Satu Mare, a river crossing in Romania
title: Golescu
